mapper.sql: RID, EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, EVENT_TYPE1, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, DOMAIN_NAME, CC_DOMAIN, IP, ATTACK_IP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, MEMO, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, SNAPSHOP

RID, EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, EVENT_TYPE1, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, DOMAIN_NAME, CC_DOMAIN, IP, ATTACK_IP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, MEMO, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, SNAPSHOP
mapper.update: update SMMS_EVENT_MAIN set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: select SNAPSHOP from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RID = #{RID}
mapper.insert: insert into SMMS_EVENT_MAIN ( RID, EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, EVENT_TYPE1, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, DOMAIN_NAME, CC_DOMAIN, IP, ATTACK_IP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, MEMO, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE) values ( #{RID}, #{EVENT_SOURCE}, #{CLIENTNAME}, #{REPORT_CITY}, #{EVENT_TYPE1}, #{THREAT_LEVEL}, #{THREAT_NAME}, #{THREAT_TYPE1}, #{THREAT_TYPE2}, #{THREAT_TYPE3}, #{THREAT_TYPE4}, #{ACCESS_ID}, #{ROOM_NAME}, #{ROOM_IDX}, #{DOMAIN_NAME}, #{CC_DOMAIN}, #{IP}, #{ATTACK_IP}, #{SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{IS_FORCE_CLOSE}, #{IS_WHITE_LIST}, #{FORCE_CLOSE_DESC}, #{RECTIFY_TERM}, #{CLOSE_TERM}, #{SEND_TIME}, #{SEND_TIMESTAMP}, #{RECTIFY_STATE}, #{RECTIFY_MEASURE}, #{FEEDBACK_TIME}, #{FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP}, #{WEB_CASE_RID}, #{MAPPING_MODE}, #{MEMO}, #{CREATTIME}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE})
